One of our top picks in Rishīkesh.Shalom Backpackers Rishikesh in Rishīkesh provides adults only accommodations with a restaurant, a garden and a terrace. Located around a 14-minute walk from Patanjali International Yoga Foundation, the hostel with free WiFi is also 1.6 miles away from Ram Jhula. The property provides entertainment staff and a 24-hour front desk.

Complete with a private bathroom, all guest rooms at the hostel are equipped with air conditioning, and some rooms here will provide you with a patio.

A continental breakfast is available daily at Shalom Backpackers Rishikesh.

Triveni Ghat is 3 miles from the accommodation, while Laxman Jhula is 6 miles away. The nearest airport is Dehradun Airport, 13 miles from Shalom Backpackers Rishikesh.

This is our guests' favorite part of Rishīkesh, according to independent reviews.

Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 9.4 for a two-person trip.
